HHNBRG_creation_primary_peoples_congress_category = {

	HHNBRG_creation_primary_peoples_congress = {

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		
		available = {
		}

		visible = {
		}
		
		cost = 15
		days_remove = 30
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		remove_effect = {
			set_country_flag = primary_peoples_congress_is_created
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_primary_peoples_congress_tt
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 30
		}
	}
}
	
HHNBRG_national_peoples_congresses_category = {
	
	HHNBRG_expansion_power_congress = {

		icon = generic_civil_support
		
		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = HHNBRG_expansion_power_congress_trigger_tt		
				set_temp_variable = { custom_cost = 10 }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { custom_cost = custom_cost_minus }
				set_temp_variable = { cost_multiply = 5 }
				set_temp_variable = { total_num_of_congresses_var = num_of_congresses_var }
				add_to_temp_variable = { total_num_of_congresses_var = compensatory_value }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { total_num_of_congresses_var = num_of_congresses_no_check_var }
				multiply_temp_variable = { cost_multiply = total_num_of_congresses_var }
				add_to_temp_variable = { custom_cost = cost_multiply }
				check_variable = { custom_cost > 39 }
			}
		}

		visible = {
		}
		
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			set_temp_variable = { stability_cost = stability }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { stability_cost = modifier@stability_factor }
			check_variable = { stability_cost > 0.05 }
			#for text
			set_temp_variable = { text_stability = stability }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { text_stability = modifier@stability_factor }
			multiply_temp_variable = { text_stability = 100 }
		}
		custom_cost_text = expansion_power_congress_cost
		
		days_remove = 10
		
		remove_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { custom_cost_minus = 30 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_expansion_power_congress_effect_tt
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				add_stability = -0.05
				hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.902 } }
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_stability < 0.1
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_stability < 0.2
			}
		}
	}
	
	
	#### РЕШЕНИЯ НА СТЕЙТЫ ####
	
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_1 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 1 }
		available = {
			1 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			1 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 1 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 1 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_2 = {

			modifier = { factor = 0.4 2 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 2 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 2 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 2 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 2 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 2 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 2 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 7 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 7 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 7 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 7 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 7 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 7 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 7 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 7 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 7 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 14 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 14 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 14 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 14 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 14 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 14 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 14 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 14 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 14 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_15 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 15 }
		available = {
			15 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			15 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			15 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 21 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 21 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 21 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 21 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 21 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 21 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 21 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 21 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 21 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_22 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 22 }
		available = {
			22 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			22 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			22 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 28 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 28 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 28 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 28 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 28 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 28 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 28 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 28 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 28 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_29 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 29 }
		available = {
			29 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			29 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			29 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }

			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 29 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 35 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 35 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 35 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 35 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 35 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 35 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 35 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 35 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 35 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_36 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 36 }
		available = {
			36 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			36 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			36 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 36 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 36 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 36 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 42 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 42 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 42 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 42 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 42 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 42 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 42 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 42 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 42 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_43 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 43 }
		available = {
			43 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			43 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			43 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 43 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 43 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 43 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 43 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 43 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 43 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 43 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 43 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 43 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.3 49 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 49 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 49 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 49 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 49 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 49 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 49 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 49 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_50 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 50 }
		available = {
			50 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			50 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			50 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 50 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 50 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 50 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 50 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 50 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 50 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 50 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 50 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 50 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.5 56 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 56 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 56 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 56 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 56 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 56 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_57 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 57 }
		available = {
			57 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			57 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			57 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 57 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 57 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 57 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 57 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 57 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 57 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 57 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 57 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 57 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.6 63 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 63 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 63 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 63 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 63 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_64 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 64 }
		available = {
			64 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			64 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			64 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 64 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 64 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 64 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 64 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 64 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 64 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 64 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 64 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 64 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.7 70 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 70 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 70 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 70 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_71 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 71 }
		available = {
			71 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			71 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			71 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 71 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 71 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 71 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 71 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 71 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 71 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 71 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 71 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 71 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.8 77 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 77 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 77 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_78 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 78 }
		available = {
			78 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			78 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			78 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 78 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 78 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 78 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 78 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 78 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 78 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 78 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 78 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 78 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.9 84 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 84 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_85 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 85 }
		available = {
			85 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			85 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			85 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 85 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 85 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 85 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 85 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 85 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 85 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 85 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 85 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 85 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_92 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 92 }
		available = {
			92 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			92 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			92 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 92 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 92 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 92 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 92 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 92 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 92 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 92 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 92 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 92 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 99 }
		available = {
			99 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			99 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			99 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 99 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 99 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 99 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 99 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 99 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 99 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 99 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 99 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 99 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			106 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 106 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 106 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 106 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 106 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 106 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 106 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 106 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 106 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 106 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			113 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 113 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 113 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 113 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 113 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 113 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 113 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 113 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 113 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 113 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 120 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 120 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 120 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 120 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 120 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 120 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 120 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 120 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 120 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 127 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 127 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 127 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 127 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 127 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 127 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 127 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 127 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 127 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

		visible = {
			128 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			128 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}

				add = 30

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 134 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 134 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 134 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 134 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 134 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 134 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 134 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 134 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 134 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_135 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 135 }
		available = {
			135 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			135 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			135 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 141 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 141 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 141 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 141 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 141 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 141 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 141 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 141 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 141 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_142 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 142 }
		available = {
			142 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			142 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			142 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }

			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 142 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 148 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 148 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 148 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 148 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 148 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 148 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 148 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 148 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 148 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			149 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }

				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 155 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 155 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 155 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 155 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 155 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 155 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 155 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 155 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 155 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_156 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 156 }
		available = {
			156 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			156 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			156 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 156 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 156 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 156 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 156 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 156 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 156 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 156 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 156 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 156 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.3 162 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 162 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 162 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 162 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 162 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 162 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 162 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 162 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_163 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 163 }
		available = {
			163 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			163 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			163 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 163 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 163 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 163 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 163 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 163 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 163 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 163 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 163 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 163 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
