			modifier = { factor = 0.5 169 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 169 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 169 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 169 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 169 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 169 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_170 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 170 }
		available = {
			170 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			170 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			170 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 170 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 170 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 170 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 170 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 170 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 170 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 170 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 170 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 170 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.6 176 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 176 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 176 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 176 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 176 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_177 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 177 }
		available = {
			177 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			177 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			177 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 177 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 177 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 177 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 177 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 177 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 177 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 177 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 177 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 177 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.7 183 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 183 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 183 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 183 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_184 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 184 }
		available = {
			184 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			184 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			184 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 184 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 184 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 184 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 184 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 184 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 184 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 184 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 184 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 184 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.8 190 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 190 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 190 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_191 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 191 }
		available = {
			191 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			191 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			191 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 191 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 191 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 191 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 191 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 191 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 191 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 191 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 191 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 191 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.9 197 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 197 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_198 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 198 }
		available = {
			198 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			198 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			198 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 198 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 198 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 198 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 198 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 198 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 198 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 198 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 198 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 198 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_205 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 205 }
		available = {
			205 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			205 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			205 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 205 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 205 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 205 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 205 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 205 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 205 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 205 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 205 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 205 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 212 }
		available = {
			212 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			212 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			212 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 212 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 212 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 212 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 212 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 212 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 212 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 212 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 212 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 212 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			219 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 219 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 219 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 219 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 219 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 219 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 219 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 219 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 219 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 219 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			226 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 226 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 226 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 226 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 226 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 226 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 226 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 226 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 226 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 226 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 233 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 233 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 233 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 233 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 233 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 233 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 233 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 233 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 233 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 240 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 240 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 240 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 240 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 247 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 247 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 247 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 247 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 247 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 247 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 247 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 247 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 247 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 248 }
		available = {
			248 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			248 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			248 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 254 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 254 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 254 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 254 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 254 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 254 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 254 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 254 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 254 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_255 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 255 }
		available = {
			255 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			255 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			255 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }

			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 261 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 261 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 261 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 261 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 261 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 261 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 261 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 261 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 261 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_262 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 262 }
		available = {
			262 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			262 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			262 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 262 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 262 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 262 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 262 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 262 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 268 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 268 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 268 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 268 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 268 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 268 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 268 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 268 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 268 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_269 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 269 }
		available = {
			269 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			269 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			269 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 269 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 269 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 269 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 269 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 269 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 269 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 269 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 269 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 269 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.3 275 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 275 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 275 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 275 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 275 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 275 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 275 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 275 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_276 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 276 }
		available = {
			276 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			276 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			276 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 276 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 276 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 276 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 276 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 276 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 276 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 276 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 276 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 276 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.5 282 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 282 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 282 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 282 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 282 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 282 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_283 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 283 }
		available = {
			283 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			283 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			283 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 283 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 283 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 283 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 283 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 283 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 283 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 283 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 283 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 283 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.6 289 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 289 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 289 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 289 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 289 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_290 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 290 }
		available = {
			290 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			290 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			290 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 290 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 290 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 290 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 290 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 290 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 290 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 290 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 290 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 290 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.7 296 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 296 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 296 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 296 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_297 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 297 }
		available = {
			297 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			297 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			297 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 297 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 297 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 297 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 297 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 297 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 297 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 297 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 297 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 297 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.8 303 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 303 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 303 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_304 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 304 }
		available = {
			304 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			304 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			304 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 304 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 304 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 304 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 304 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 304 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 304 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 304 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 304 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 304 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.9 310 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 310 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_311 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 311 }
		available = {
			311 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			311 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			311 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 311 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 311 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 311 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 311 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 311 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 311 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 311 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 311 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 311 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_318 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 318 }
		available = {
			318 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			318 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			318 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 318 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 318 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 318 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 318 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 318 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 318 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 318 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 318 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 318 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 325 }
		available = {
			325 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			325 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			325 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 325 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 325 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 325 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 325 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 325 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 325 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 325 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 325 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 325 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			332 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 332 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 332 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 332 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 332 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 332 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 332 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 332 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 332 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 332 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			339 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 339 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 339 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 339 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 339 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 339 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 339 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 339 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 339 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 339 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 346 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 346 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 346 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 346 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 346 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 346 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 346 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 346 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 346 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
