				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 353 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 353 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 353 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 353 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 353 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 353 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 353 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 353 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 360 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 360 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 360 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 360 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 360 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 360 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 360 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 360 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 360 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_361 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 361 }
		available = {
			361 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			361 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			361 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 367 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 367 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 367 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 367 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 367 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 367 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 367 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 367 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 367 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_368 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 368 }
		available = {
			368 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			368 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			368 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }

			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 374 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 374 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 374 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 374 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 374 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 374 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 374 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 374 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 374 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_375 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 375 }
		available = {
			375 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			375 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			375 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 375 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 375 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 375 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 381 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 381 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 381 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 381 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 381 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 381 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 381 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 381 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 381 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_382 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 382 }
		available = {
			382 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			382 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			382 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 382 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 382 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 382 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 382 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 382 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 382 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 382 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 382 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 382 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.3 388 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 388 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 388 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 388 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 388 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 388 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 388 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 388 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_389 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 389 }
		available = {
			389 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			389 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			389 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 389 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 389 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 389 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 389 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 389 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 389 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 389 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 389 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 389 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.5 395 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 395 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 395 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 395 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 395 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 395 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_396 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 396 }
		available = {
			396 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			396 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			396 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 396 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 396 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 396 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 396 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 396 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 396 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 396 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 396 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 396 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.6 402 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 402 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 402 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 402 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 402 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_403 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 403 }
		available = {
			403 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			403 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			403 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 403 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 403 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 403 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 403 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 403 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 403 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 403 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 403 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 403 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.7 409 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 409 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 409 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 409 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_410 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 410 }
		available = {
			410 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			410 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			410 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 410 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 410 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 410 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 410 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 410 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 410 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 410 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 410 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 410 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.8 416 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 416 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 416 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_417 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 417 }
		available = {
			417 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			417 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			417 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 417 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 417 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 417 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 417 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 417 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 417 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 417 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 417 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 417 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.9 423 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 423 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_424 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 424 }
		available = {
			424 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			424 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			424 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 424 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 424 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 424 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 424 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 424 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 424 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 424 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 424 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 424 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_431 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 431 }
		available = {
			431 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			431 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			431 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 431 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 431 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 431 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 431 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 431 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 431 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 431 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 431 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 431 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 438 }
		available = {
			438 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			438 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			438 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 438 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 438 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 438 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 438 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 438 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 438 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 438 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 438 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 438 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			445 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 445 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 445 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 445 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 445 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 445 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 445 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 445 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 445 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 445 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			452 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 452 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 452 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 452 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 452 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 452 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 452 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 452 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 452 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 452 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 459 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 459 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 459 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 459 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 459 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 459 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 459 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 459 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 459 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 466 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 466 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 466 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 466 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 466 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 466 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 466 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }

				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}

			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt

				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 473 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 473 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 473 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 473 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 473 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 473 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 473 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 473 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 473 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

		highlight_states = { state = 474 }

		}
		visible = {
			474 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			474 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 480 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 480 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 480 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 480 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 480 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 480 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 480 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 480 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }

				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			481 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 487 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 487 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 487 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 487 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 487 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 487 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 487 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 487 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 488 }

		}
		visible = {
			488 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			488 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }

			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 494 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 494 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 494 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 494 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 494 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 494 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 494 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 494 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 494 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_495 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 495 }
		available = {
			495 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			495 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			495 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 495 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 495 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 495 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 495 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 495 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 495 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 495 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 495 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 495 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.3 501 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 501 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 501 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 501 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 501 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 501 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 501 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 501 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_502 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 502 }
		available = {
			502 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			502 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			502 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 502 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 502 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 502 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 502 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 502 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 502 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 502 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 502 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 502 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.5 508 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 508 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 508 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 508 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 508 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 508 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_509 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 509 }
		available = {
			509 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			509 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			509 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 509 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 509 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 509 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 509 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 509 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 509 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 509 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 509 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 509 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.6 515 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 515 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 515 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 515 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 515 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_516 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 516 }
		available = {
			516 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			516 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			516 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 516 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 516 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 516 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 516 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 516 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 516 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 516 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 516 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 516 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.7 522 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 522 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 522 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 522 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_523 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 523 }
		available = {
			523 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			523 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			523 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 523 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 523 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 523 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 523 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 523 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 523 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 523 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 523 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 523 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
