			modifier = { factor = 0.8 529 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 529 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 529 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_530 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 530 }
		available = {
			530 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			530 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			530 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 530 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 530 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 530 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 530 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 530 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 530 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 530 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 530 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 530 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.9 536 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 536 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_537 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 537 }
		available = {
			537 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			537 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			537 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 537 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 537 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 537 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 537 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 537 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 537 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 537 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 537 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 537 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 1 543 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_544 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 544 }
		available = {
			544 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			544 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			544 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 544 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 544 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 544 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 544 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 544 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 544 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 544 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 544 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 544 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_551 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 551 }
		available = {
			551 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			551 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			551 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 551 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 551 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 551 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 551 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 551 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 551 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 551 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 551 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 551 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			558 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 558 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 558 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 558 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 558 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 558 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 558 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 558 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 558 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 558 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			565 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 565 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 565 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 565 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 565 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 565 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 565 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 565 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 565 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 565 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			572 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 572 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 572 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 572 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 572 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 572 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 572 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 572 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 572 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 572 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 579 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 579 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 579 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 579 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 579 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 579 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 579 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 579 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 579 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 586 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 586 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 586 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 586 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 586 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 586 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 586 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 586 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 586 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 593 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 593 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 593 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 593 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 593 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 593 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 600 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 600 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 600 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 600 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 600 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 600 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 600 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 600 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 600 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

		highlight_states = { state = 601 }
		available = {

		}
		visible = {
			601 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			601 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}

			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes

			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 607 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 607 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 607 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 607 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 607 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 607 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 607 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 607 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 607 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_608 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 608 }
		available = {
			608 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			608 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			608 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}

				add = 20

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }

				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 614 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 614 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 614 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 614 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 614 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 614 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 614 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 614 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 614 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_615 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 615 }
		available = {
			615 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			615 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			615 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}

				add = 10

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 615 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 621 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 621 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 621 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 621 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 621 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 621 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 621 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 621 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 622 }

		}
		visible = {

				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			622 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 628 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 628 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 628 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 628 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 628 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 628 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 628 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 628 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }

				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			629 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 635 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 635 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 635 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 635 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 635 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 635 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 635 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 635 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 635 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_636 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 636 }
		available = {
			636 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			636 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			636 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }

				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 636 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }

				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 642 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 642 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 642 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 642 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 642 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 642 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 642 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_643 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 643 }
		available = {
			643 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			643 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			643 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }

			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 643 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }

			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 649 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 649 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 649 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 649 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 649 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 649 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 649 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 649 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 649 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_650 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 650 }
		available = {
			650 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			650 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			650 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 650 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 650 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 650 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 650 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 650 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.8 650 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 656 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 656 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 656 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 656 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 656 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 656 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 656 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 656 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 656 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_657 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 657 }
		available = {

		}
		visible = {
			657 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			657 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 663 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 663 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 663 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 663 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 663 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 663 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 663 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }

		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			664 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT

			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 670 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 670 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 670 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 670 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 670 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 670 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 670 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 670 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 670 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_671 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 671 }
		available = {
			671 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			671 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			671 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 671 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 671 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 671 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 677 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 677 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 677 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 677 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 677 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 677 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 677 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 677 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 677 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_678 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 678 }
		available = {
			678 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			678 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			678 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 678 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 678 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 684 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 684 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 684 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 684 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 684 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 684 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 684 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 684 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 684 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_685 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 685 }
		available = {
			685 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			685 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			685 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 685 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 685 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 691 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 691 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 691 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 691 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 691 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 691 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 691 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 691 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 691 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_692 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 692 }
		available = {
			692 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			692 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			692 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 692 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 692 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 698 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 698 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 698 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 698 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 698 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 698 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 698 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 698 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 698 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_699 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 699 }
		available = {
			699 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			699 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			699 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 699 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 699 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 699 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }

			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 705 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 705 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 705 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 705 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 705 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 705 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 705 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 705 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 705 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_706 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 706 }
		available = {
			706 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			706 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			706 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 706 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 706 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 706 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 706 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 706 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 706 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 706 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 706 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 706 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
