				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 712 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 712 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 712 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 712 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 712 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 712 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 712 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 712 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 712 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_713 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 713 }
		available = {
			713 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			713 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			713 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 713 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 713 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 713 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 713 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 713 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 713 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 713 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 713 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 713 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 719 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 719 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 719 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 719 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 719 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 719 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 719 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 719 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 719 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_720 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 720 }
		available = {
			720 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			720 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			720 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 720 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 720 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 720 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 720 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 720 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 720 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 720 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 720 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 720 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 726 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 726 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 726 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 726 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 726 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 726 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 726 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 726 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 726 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_727 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 727 }
		available = {
			727 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			727 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			727 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 727 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 727 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 727 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 727 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 727 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 727 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 727 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 727 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 727 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 733 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 733 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 733 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 733 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 733 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 733 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 733 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 733 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 733 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_734 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 734 }
		available = {
			734 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			734 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			734 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 734 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 734 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 734 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 734 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 740 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 740 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 740 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 740 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 740 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 740 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 740 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 740 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_741 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 741 }
		available = {
			741 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			741 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			741 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 741 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 741 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 741 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 747 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 747 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 747 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 747 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 747 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 747 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 747 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 747 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_748 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 748 }
		available = {
			748 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			748 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			748 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 748 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 748 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 748 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 754 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 754 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 754 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 754 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 754 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 754 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 754 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 754 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 754 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_755 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 755 }
		available = {
			755 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			755 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			755 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 755 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 755 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 755 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 755 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 755 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 761 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 761 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 761 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 761 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 761 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 761 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 761 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 761 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 761 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_762 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 762 }
		available = {
			762 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			762 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			762 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 762 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 762 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 762 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 762 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 762 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 768 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 768 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 768 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 768 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 768 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 768 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 768 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 768 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 768 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_769 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 769 }
		available = {
			769 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			769 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			769 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 769 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 769 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 775 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 775 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 775 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 775 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 775 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 775 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 775 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 775 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 775 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_776 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 776 }
		available = {
			776 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			776 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			776 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 776 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 776 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 776 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 776 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 776 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 776 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 776 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 776 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 776 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 782 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 782 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 782 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 782 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 782 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 782 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 782 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 782 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 782 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_783 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 783 }
		available = {
			783 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			783 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			783 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 783 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 783 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 783 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 783 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 783 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 783 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 783 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 783 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 783 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 789 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 789 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 789 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 789 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 789 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 789 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 789 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 789 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 789 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_790 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 790 }
		available = {
			790 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			790 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			790 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 790 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 790 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 790 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 790 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 796 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 796 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 796 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 796 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 796 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 796 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 796 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 796 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 796 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_797 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 797 }
		available = {
			797 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			797 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			797 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 797 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 797 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 797 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 797 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 797 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 797 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 797 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 797 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 797 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 803 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 803 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 803 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 803 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 803 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 803 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 803 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 803 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 803 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_804 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 804 }
		available = {
			804 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			804 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			804 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 804 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 804 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 804 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 804 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 804 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 804 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 804 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 804 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 804 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.2 810 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 810 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 810 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 810 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 810 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 810 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 810 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 810 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_811 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 811 }
		available = {
			811 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			811 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			811 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 811 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 811 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 811 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 811 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 811 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 811 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 811 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 811 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 811 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_818 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 818 }
		available = {
			818 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			818 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			818 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 818 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 818 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 818 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 818 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 818 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.2 824 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 824 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 824 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 824 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 824 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 824 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 824 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 824 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_825 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 825 }
		available = {
			825 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			825 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			825 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 825 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 825 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 825 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 825 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 825 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 825 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 825 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 825 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 825 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.2 831 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 831 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 831 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_832 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 832 }
		available = {
			832 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			832 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			832 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 832 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 832 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 832 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 832 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 832 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 832 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 832 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 832 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.2 838 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 838 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 838 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 838 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 838 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 838 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 838 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 838 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_839 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 839 }
		available = {
			839 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			839 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			839 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 839 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 839 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 839 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 839 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 839 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 839 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 839 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 839 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 839 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.2 845 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 845 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 845 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 845 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 845 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 845 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 845 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 845 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 845 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_846 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 846 }
		available = {
			846 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			846 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			846 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 846 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 846 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 846 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 846 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 846 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 846 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 846 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 846 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 846 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.2 852 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 852 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 852 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 852 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 852 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 852 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 852 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 852 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 852 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_853 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 853 }
		available = {
			853 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			853 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			853 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 853 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 853 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 853 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 853 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 853 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 853 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 853 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 853 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 853 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.2 859 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 859 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 859 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 859 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 859 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 859 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 859 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 859 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 859 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_860 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 860 }
		available = {
			860 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			860 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			860 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 860 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 860 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 860 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 860 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 860 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 860 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 860 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 860 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 860 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.3 866 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 866 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
