	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_867 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 867 }
		available = {
			867 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			867 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			867 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 867 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 867 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 867 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 867 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 867 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 867 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 867 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.2 873 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 873 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 873 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 873 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 873 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 873 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 873 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 873 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 873 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_874 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 874 }
		available = {
			874 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			874 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			874 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 874 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 874 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 874 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 874 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 874 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 874 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 874 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 874 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 874 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.3 880 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 880 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_881 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 881 }
		available = {
			881 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			881 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			881 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 881 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 881 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 881 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 881 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 881 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.8 881 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 881 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_888 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 888 }
		available = {
			888 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			888 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			888 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 888 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 888 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 888 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 888 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 888 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 888 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 888 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 888 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.3 894 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 894 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 894 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 894 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 894 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 894 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_895 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 895 }
		available = {
			895 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			895 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			895 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 895 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 895 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 895 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 895 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 895 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 895 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 895 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 895 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 895 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.3 901 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 901 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 901 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 901 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 901 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 901 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 901 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 901 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_902 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 902 }
		available = {
			902 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			902 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			902 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 902 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 902 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 902 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 902 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 902 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 902 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 902 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 902 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 902 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.4 908 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 908 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 908 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 908 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_909 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 909 }
		available = {
			909 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			909 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			909 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 909 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 909 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 909 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 909 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 909 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 909 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 909 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 909 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 909 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.3 915 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 915 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 915 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 915 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 915 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_916 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 916 }
		available = {
			916 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			916 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			916 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 916 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 916 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 916 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 916 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 916 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 916 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 916 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 916 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 916 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.2 922 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 922 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 922 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 922 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 922 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 922 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 922 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_923 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 923 }
		available = {
			923 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			923 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			923 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 923 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 923 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 923 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 923 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 923 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 923 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 923 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 923 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_930 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 930 }
		available = {
			930 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			930 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			930 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 930 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 930 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 930 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 930 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 930 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 937 }
		available = {
			937 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			937 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			937 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 937 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 937 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 937 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.3 943 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 943 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_944 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 944 }
		available = {
			944 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			944 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			944 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 944 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 944 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 944 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 944 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 944 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.2 950 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 950 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 950 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 950 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 950 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 950 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 950 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 950 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 950 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_951 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 951 }
		available = {
			951 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			951 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			951 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 951 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 951 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 951 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 951 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 951 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 951 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 951 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 951 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 951 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.3 957 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 957 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 957 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 957 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 957 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 957 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_958 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 958 }
		available = {
			958 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			958 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			958 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 958 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 958 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 958 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 958 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 958 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 958 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 958 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 958 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 958 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.4 964 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 964 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 964 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 964 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_965 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 965 }
		available = {
			965 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			965 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			965 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 965 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 965 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 965 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 965 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 965 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 965 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 965 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 965 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 965 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_972 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 972 }
		available = {
			972 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			972 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			972 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 972 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 972 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 972 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 972 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_979 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 979 }
		available = {
			979 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			979 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			979 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 979 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 979 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 979 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.2 985 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 985 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 985 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 985 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 985 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 985 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_986 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 986 }
		available = {
			986 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			986 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			986 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 986 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 986 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 986 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 986 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 986 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 986 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 986 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 986 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.2 992 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 992 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 992 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 992 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 992 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 992 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 992 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 992 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 992 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_993 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 993 }
		available = {
			993 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			993 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			993 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 993 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 993 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 993 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 993 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 993 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 993 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 993 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 993 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 993 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.2 999 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 999 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 999 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 999 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 999 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 999 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 999 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 999 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 999 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_1000 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 1000 }
		available = {
			1000 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			1000 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1000 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1000 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1000 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1000 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1000 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1000 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1000 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1000 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 1000 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 1000 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1006 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1006 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1006 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1006 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1006 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1006 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 1006 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 1006 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_1007 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 1007 }
		available = {
			1007 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			1007 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1007 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1007 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1007 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1007 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1007 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1007 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1007 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1007 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 1007 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 1007 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1013 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1013 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1013 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1013 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1013 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1013 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1013 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 1013 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 1013 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_1014 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 1014 }
		available = {
			1014 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			1014 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1014 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1014 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1014 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1014 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1014 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1014 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1014 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1014 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 1014 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 1014 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1020 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1020 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1020 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1020 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1020 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1020 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1020 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 1020 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 1020 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_1021 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 1021 }
		available = {
			1021 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			1021 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1021 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1021 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1021 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1021 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1021 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1021 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1021 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1021 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 1021 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 1021 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1027 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1027 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1027 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1027 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1027 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1027 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1027 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 1027 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 1027 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_1028 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 1028 }
		available = {
			1028 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			1028 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1028 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1028 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1028 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1028 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1028 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1028 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1028 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1028 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 1028 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 1028 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1034 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1034 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1034 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1034 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1034 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1034 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1034 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 1034 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 1034 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
