	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_1035 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 1035 }
		available = {
			1035 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			1035 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1035 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1035 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1035 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1035 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1035 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1035 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1035 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1035 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 1035 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 1035 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1041 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1041 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1041 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1041 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1041 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1041 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1041 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 1041 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 1041 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_1042 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 1042 }
		available = {
			1042 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			1042 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1042 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1042 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1042 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1042 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1042 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1042 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1042 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1042 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 1042 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 1042 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}
	}

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1048 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1048 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1048 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1048 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1048 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1048 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_1049 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 1049 }
		available = {
			1049 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			1049 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1049 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1049 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1049 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1049 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1049 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1049 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1055 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1055 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1055 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1055 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1055 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_1056 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 1056 }
		available = {
			1056 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			1056 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1056 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1056 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1056 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1056 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1056 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }

				is_owned_by = ROOT

			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1063 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1063 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }

			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1069 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 1070 }
		available = {
			1070 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			1070 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1070 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1070 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1070 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1076 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1076 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1076 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1076 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_1077 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 1077 }
		available = {
			1077 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			1077 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1077 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1077 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1077 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1077 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1077 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1077 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1083 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1083 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1083 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 1084 }
		available = {

		}
		visible = {
			1084 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1084 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1084 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1084 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }

			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1090 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1090 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1090 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 1091 }

		}
		visible = {

				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1091 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1091 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1091 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1097 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1097 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1097 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1097 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1097 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1097 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_1098 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 1098 }
		available = {
			1098 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			1098 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1098 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1098 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1098 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1098 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1098 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1098 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1098 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1098 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1104 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1104 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1104 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1104 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1104 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1104 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1104 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 1104 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 1104 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_1105 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 1105 }
		available = {
			1105 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			1105 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1105 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1105 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1105 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1105 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1111 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1111 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.4 1111 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1111 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1111 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1111 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1111 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 1111 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1 1111 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
		}

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_1112 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		highlight_states = { state = 1112 }
		available = {
			1112 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			1112 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1112 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.250 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.499 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.750 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.2 1112 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.3 1112 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.5 1112 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.6 1112 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.7 1112 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.8 1112 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.9 1112 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
